snippet: Two iconoclastic senators — Chuck Hagel and John McCain — shared a military background and a similar worldview, and they used to be close. What happened? Accounts differ.
abstract: Chuck Hagel and John McCain, former political allies and close friends, remain estranged as Hagel prepares to enter contentious confirmation hearing to be Pres Obama's secretary of defense; split between the two men began over differences concerning the Iraq War.
lead_paragraph: Two iconoclastic senators — Chuck Hagel and John McCain — shared a military background and a similar worldview, and they used to be close. What happened? Accounts differ.

headline.seo: McCain and Hagel, Once Friends and Now Estranged
headline.main: Veterans and Senate Buddies, Until Another War Split Them
headline.print_headline: Veterans and Senate Buddies, Until Another War Split Them

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
